A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Where to begin? This movie made me feel like I was Jar Jar Binked. What Rian Johnson made was a Star Wars parody\, that was no where near as good (or funny) as Space Balls. While the acting was superb\, this mess of a story was unnecessarily silly at points\, and super space flying Leia looked ridiculous. The casino planet scenes were stolen from the prequels\, and made to look even more like a cartoon. And (spoiler alert) Luke dies because...I don't know\, maybe he had a broken heart like Padmé that this movie was so bad. Hopefully in episode 9 we'll discover the whole thing was a bad dream.
